00064 class IndexIter
00065 {
00066 public:
00067     IndexIter()
00068         : mEnd(0), mItem(0) {}
00069     IndexIter(Index32 item, Index32 end)
00070         : mEnd(end), mItem(item) {}
00071     IndexIter(const IndexIter& other)
00072         : mEnd(other.mEnd), mItem(other.mItem) { }
00073 
00074     inline Index32 end() const { return mEnd; }
00075 
00077     inline void reset(Index32 item, Index32 end) {
00078         mItem = item;
00079         mEnd = end;
00080     }
00081 
00083     inline Index32 operator*() { return mItem; }
00084     inline Index32 operator*() const { return mItem; }
00085 
00087     inline operator bool() const { return mItem < mEnd; }
00088     inline bool test() const { return mItem < mEnd; }
00089 
00091     inline IndexIter& operator++() {
00092         ++mItem;
00093         return *this;
00094     }
00095 
00097     inline IndexIter operator++(int /*dummy*/) {
00098         IndexIter newIterator(*this);
00099         this->operator++();
00100         return newIterator;
00101     }
00102 
00104     inline bool next() { this->operator++(); return this->test(); }
00105     inline bool increment() { this->next(); return this->test(); }
00106 
00108     inline bool operator==(const IndexIter& other) const { return mItem == other.mItem; }
00109     inline bool operator!=(const IndexIter& other) const { return !this->operator==(other); }
00110 
00111 private:
00112     Index32 mEnd, mItem;
00113 }; // class IndexIter

00117 template <typename ValueIterT>
00118 class ValueIndexIter
00119 {
00120 public:
00121     ValueIndexIter(ValueIterT& iter)
00122         : mIndexIter(), mIter(iter), mParent(mIter.parent())
00123     {
00124         if (mIter) {
00125             Index32 start = mIter.offset() > 0 ? Index32(mParent.getValue(mIter.offset() - 1)) : Index32(0);
00126             mIndexIter.reset(start, *mIter);
00127             if (!mIndexIter.test())   this->operator++();
00128         }
00129     }
00130     ValueIndexIter(const ValueIndexIter& other)
00131         : mIndexIter(other.mIndexIter), mIter(other.mIter), mParent(other.mParent) { }
00132 
00133     inline Index32 end() const { return mIndexIter.end(); }
00134 
00135     inline void reset(Index32 item, Index32 end) {
00136         mIndexIter.reset(item, end);
00137     }
00138 
00140     inline Index32 operator*() { return *mIndexIter; }
00141     inline Index32 operator*() const { return *mIndexIter; }
00142 
00144     inline operator bool() const { return mIter; }
00145     inline bool test() const { return mIter; }
00146 
00148     inline ValueIndexIter& operator++() {
00149         mIndexIter.next();
00150         while (!mIndexIter.test() && mIter.next()) {
00151             mIndexIter.reset(mParent.getValue(mIter.offset() - 1), *mIter);
00152         }
00153         return *this;
00154     }
00155 
00157     inline ValueIndexIter operator++(int /*dummy*/) {
00158         IndexIter newIterator(*this);
00159         this->operator++();
00160         return newIterator;
00161     }
00162 
00164     inline bool next() { this->operator++(); return this->test(); }
00165     inline bool increment() { this->next(); return this->test(); }
00166 
00168     inline Coord getCoord() const { return mIter.getCoord(); }
00170     inline void getCoord(Coord& xyz) const { xyz = mIter.getCoord(); }
00171 
00173     inline const IndexIter& indexIter() const { return mIndexIter; }
00175     inline const ValueIterT& valueIter() const { return mIter; }
00176 
00178     bool operator==(const ValueIndexIter& other) const { return *mIndexIter == *other.mIndexIter; }
00179     bool operator!=(const ValueIndexIter& other) const { return !this->operator==(other); }
00180 
00181 private:
00182     IndexIter mIndexIter;
00183     ValueIterT mIter;
00184     const typename ValueIterT::NodeType& mParent;
00185 }; // ValueIndexIter

00195 template<typename TreeT, typename ValueT> struct IndexIterTraits;
00196 
00197 template<typename TreeT>
00198 struct IndexIterTraits<TreeT, typename TreeT::LeafNodeType::ValueAllCIter> {
00199     typedef IndexIter Iterator;
00200     static Iterator begin(const typename TreeT::LeafNodeType& leaf) {
00201         return Iterator(leaf.beginIndexAll());
00202     }
00203 };
00204 
00205 template<typename TreeT>
00206 struct IndexIterTraits<TreeT, typename TreeT::LeafNodeType::ValueOnCIter> {
00207     typedef typename TreeT::LeafNodeType::IndexOnIter Iterator;
00208     static Iterator begin(const typename TreeT::LeafNodeType& leaf) {
00209         return Iterator(leaf.beginIndexOn());
00210     }
00211 };
00212 
00213 template<typename TreeT>
00214 struct IndexIterTraits<TreeT, typename TreeT::LeafNodeType::ValueOffCIter> {
00215     typedef typename TreeT::LeafNodeType::IndexOffIter Iterator;
00216     static Iterator begin(const typename TreeT::LeafNodeType& leaf) {
00217         return Iterator(leaf.beginIndexOff());
00218     }
00219 };

00234 template <typename IteratorT, typename FilterT>
00235 class FilterIndexIter
00236 {
00237 public:
00238     FilterIndexIter(const IteratorT& iterator, const FilterT& filter)
00239         : mIterator(iterator), mFilter(filter) { if (mIterator) { this->reset(*mIterator, mIterator.end()); } }
00240     FilterIndexIter(const FilterIndexIter& other)
00241         : mIterator(other.mIterator), mFilter(other.mFilter) { }
00242 
00243     Index32 end() const { return mIterator.end(); }
00244 
00246     void reset(Index32 begin, Index32 end) {
00247         mIterator.reset(begin, end);
00248         while (mIterator.test() && !mFilter.valid(*mIterator)) {
00249             ++mIterator;
00250         }
00251     }
00252 
00254     Index32 operator*() { return *mIterator; }
00255     Index32 operator*() const { return *mIterator; }
00256 
00258     operator bool() const { return mIterator.test(); }
00259     bool test() const { return mIterator.test(); }
00260 
00262     FilterIndexIter& operator++() {
00263         while (true) {
00264             ++mIterator;
00265             if (!mIterator.test() || mFilter.valid(*mIterator)) {
00266                 break;
00267             }
00268         }
00269         return *this;
00270     }
00271 
00273     FilterIndexIter operator++(int /*dummy*/) {
00274         FilterIndexIter newIterator(*this);
00275         this->operator++();
00276         return newIterator;
00277     }
00278 
00280     bool next() { this->operator++(); return this->test(); }
00281     bool increment() { this->next(); return this->test(); }
00282 
00284     inline const IteratorT& indexIter() const { return mIterator; }
00286     inline const FilterT& filter() const { return mFilter; }
00287 
00289     bool operator==(const FilterIndexIter& other) const { return mIterator == other.mIterator; }
00290     bool operator!=(const FilterIndexIter& other) const { return !this->operator==(other); }
00291 
00292 private:
00293     IteratorT mIterator;
00294     const FilterT mFilter;
00295 }; // class FilterIndexIter

00300 
00301 template <typename IterT>
00302 inline Index64 iterCount(const IterT& iter)
00303 {
00304     Index64 size = 0;
00305     for (IterT newIter(iter); newIter; ++newIter, ++size) { }
00306     return size;
00307 }
00308 
00309 
00310 template <>
00311 inline Index64 iterCount(const IndexIter& iter)
00312 {
00313     return iter ? iter.end() - *iter : 0;
00314 }
00315 
00316 
00317 template <typename T>
00318 inline Index64 iterCount(const ValueIndexIter<T>& iter)
00319 {
00320     T newIter(iter.valueIter());
00321     Index64 size = 0;
00322     for ( ; newIter; ++newIter) {
00323         size += *newIter - newIter.parent().getValue(newIter.offset() - 1);
00324     }
00325     return size;
00326 }
